title: Dual-Toned Cabinets, Custom Kitchen Islands*
posting_body: New Apartments for an Entirely New World!
The creative mind sees many things.
It has the ability to visualize and embrace an entirely new world of possibilities when only a spark of an idea exists.
Welcome to Elan Menlo Park — the ideal, intimate setting for innovators and visionaries such as yourself.
These brand new apartments in Menlo Park, CA truly feel like home with proximity to major employers.
Elan Menlo Park is a small enclave of residences which are on point for luxury, design, convenience and comfort.
Enjoy nearby recreation such as hiking, outdoor sports or explore the natural scenic wonders and bike trails along the water.
Take advantage of cultural and educational events at nearby venues as well.
You’ll appreciate easy access to a vibrant downtown scene with Art & Music on the Square, plus unique restaurants and shops.
Take a ride on Caltrain to access all that San Francisco and San Jose have to offer.
Live brighter, better, and bolder at Elan Menlo Park.
Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 976-1003 Sq.
- 4-Minute Walk to the Marsh Road Shuttle
- Entertainment Courtyard with Outdoor Fire Pit & BBQ Grills
- 10 Minute Drive to Palo Alto / Redwood City
- Large Landscaped Interior Courtyards with Wi-Fi
- Pet Friendly with Pet Walk Area
- Adjacent to the Scenic & Convenient Bay Trail
up to 2 pets (either cat or dog) per dwelling.
Pets are subject to a $50 monthly fee and dogs are subject to certain breed restrictions.
All Pets require a $500 pet deposit.
In order to qualify you must make at least 3x the monthly rent.
